summary: This document is a screenshot of Twitter posts from November 2018, containing allegations by a user named Jane that Donald Trump sexually assaulted her in 1994 when she was 13, and that Jeffrey Epstein was aware of her age. It references another witness using the pseudonym 'Joan Doe' who is willing to testify about Jane's claims.

persons.name: Jane
persons.context: Alleges she was 13 years old when Donald Trump sexually assaulted her at four parties in the summer of 1994, with the final encounter involving forcible rape and physical violence.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Allegedly had sexual contact with Jane when she was 13, culminating in a forcible rape where he tied her to a bed, struck her, and threatened her.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Allegedly knew Jane was 13 years old. The context implies his connection to the parties where the alleged assaults occurred.

persons.name: Maria
persons.context: A 12-year-old girl Jane claims was forced to be involved in a third encounter and whom she never saw again; Trump allegedly threatened Jane by referencing Maria's disappearance.

persons.name: Joan Doe
persons.context: A woman using a pseudonym who attests she is willing to testify that Jane told her about the sexual encounters with Trump and Epstein in the 1994-95 school year.

persons.name: Ian Madrigal
persons.context: Twitter user who posted the allegations from 'Jane' and the reference to witness 'Joan Doe'.

connections.description: Jane alleges Trump was the perpetrator of sexual assaults, including forcible rape, against her when she was a minor.
Epstein allegedly knew Jane was 13 years old, placing him in the context of the alleged events.
Implied connection through the alleged parties in 1994 where the assaults took place and Epstein's alleged knowledge.
Joan Doe is a witness who claims Jane confided in her about the alleged sexual encounters with Trump and Epstein.
Trump allegedly threatened Jane by referencing he could make her 'disappear like Maria,' implying a threatening connection to Maria.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Assaults by Trump
events.description: Jane alleges Donald Trump had sexual contact with her at four different parties in the summer of 1994, with the final encounter being a forcible rape involving physical violence and threats.

events.title: Jane's Disclosure to Joan Doe
events.description: During the 1994-95 school year, Jane allegedly told 'Joan Doe' about the sexual encounters with Trump and Epstein.

events.title: Twitter Allegations Published
events.description: Ian Madrigal posts allegations from 'Jane' on Twitter, detailing the claims of assault by Trump and the reference to witness 'Joan Doe'.

keyFacts: Jane alleges Donald Trump forcibly raped her in the summer of 1994 when she was 13 years old, after three prior sexual encounters at parties.
Jeffrey Epstein allegedly knew Jane was 13 years old at the time of the alleged assaults.
Trump allegedly threatened Jane after the rape, suggesting he could make her 'disappear like Maria,' a 12-year-old girl Jane claims was involved and then vanished.
A witness using the pseudonym 'Joan Doe' claims Jane told her about the encounters with Trump and Epstein during the 1994-95 school year and is willing to testify.
These allegations were published on Twitter by Ian Madrigal in November 2018.
